column2:
```r
grades2 <- grades %>% 
  mutate(subject2 = as.factor(subject), .after = subject,
         subject3 = relevel(subject2, 'english'))

lm4 <- lm(final ~ assignment + subject2, grades2)
lm5 <- lm(final ~ assignment + subject3, grades2)
summary(lm4)
```
